item.title: @elonmusk: In Sweden, we have 60 no-go zones. Not long ago we had zero. That tells you everything you need to k...
item.description: In Sweden, we have 60 no-go zones. Not long ago we had zero. That tells you everything you need to know about our politicians. We need a leader like Nayib Bukele.

item.title: @elonmusk: $250 MILLION. That’s how much taxpayer money was stolen in just one fraud scheme—Minnesota’s “Feedin...
item.description: $250 MILLION. That’s how much taxpayer money was stolen in just one fraud scheme—Minnesota’s “Feeding Our Future” scandal. One state. One program. Quarter of a billion dollars—gone. This isn’t incompetence. It’s a system designed for theft.

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk: "I did originally come to North America with like 2500 bucks Canadian, or 2000 US, one ba...
item.description: Elon Musk: "I did originally come to North America with like 2500 bucks Canadian, or 2000 US, one bag of books and one bag of clothes in Montreal at age of 17. So that is how I started out."

item.description: At SpaceX, helping to keep Earth orbit safe for everyone is a top priority, and we’re committed to leading the industry in space safety. Learn more →starlink.com/satellite-opera…

item.title: @elonmusk: Same professional protestor found at 100 different protests
item.description: Same professional protestor found at 100 different protests

item.title: @elonmusk: the authoritarian playbook, sound familiar? - control the narrative - label dissent as “misinformati...
item.description: the authoritarian playbook, sound familiar? - control the narrative - label dissent as “misinformation” - centralize information channels - use selective enforcement - normalize surveillance - create dependency - exploit crises - encourage self-censorship - moral framing

item.title: @elonmusk: No ID, automatic voter registration by states and mail in ballots enable massive fraud. Those factor...
item.description: No ID, automatic voter registration by states and mail in ballots enable massive fraud. Those factors also make it impossible to prove fraud, since there is no ID and no one actually showed up! You can’t conduct exit polls accurately or even count how many people went in to vote.
